original: LIANDER, Nils Halvard, Civilingenjör, Västerås, f Sundsv 23/1 02 av red Halfdan L o Elin Pettersson, gm Gun-Barbro Söderberg. KTH 25, Ramsaystip Univ College London 27—29. Anst IVA elvärmeinst 26—27 o 29—33, ångvärmeinst 34—38, ch ASEA mtrllab sed. 39. Studieres Tyskl 34, 41, Schweiz; 41. Av trycket: Ett 40-t tekn-vetensk art i in- o utl fackpress. LIVA.
translated: LIANDER, Nils Halvard, Civil Engineer, Västerås, b. Sundsvall 23/1 02, son of Halfdan L and Elin Pettersson, married to Gun-Barbro Söderberg. Graduated from KTH in 1925, recipient of Ramsay scholarship at University College London from 1927 to 1929. Employed at IVA (Royal Swedish Academy of Engineering Sciences) in electric heating installations from 1926 to 1927 and 1929 to 1933, steam heating installations from 1934 to 1938, and at ASEA (ABB) materials laboratory since 1939. Studied in Germany in 1934 and 1941, Switzerland in 1941. Published numerous articles in technical and scientific journals during the 1940s. Member of LIVA (Royal Swedish Academy of Sciences).
